HomePage.title: Nurturing Healthy Kids
HomePage.description: Supporting the health and wellbeing of children through sustainable development goals.

health.title: Health
health.subtitle: Promoting physical and mental wellbeing
health.description: Ensuring children have access to proper nutrition, healthcare, and opportunities for physical activity.

education.title: Education
education.subtitle: Supporting learning and development
education.description: Providing resources and opportunities for quality education and developmental support.

community.title: Community
community.subtitle: Building supportive environments
community.description: Creating safe and nurturing communities where children can thrive and develop.

join_mission.title: Join Our Mission
join_mission.description: Help us make a positive impact on children's health and wellbeing around the world. Together, we can create a brighter future for the next generation.

BaseTemplate.description: Supporting the health and wellbeing of children through sustainable development goals
BaseTemplate.footer_slogan: Supporting the health and wellbeing of children worldwide

About.about_paragraph: Welcome to our About page! We are a team of passionate individuals dedicated to creating amazing software.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.statement: To promote and support the health and wellbeing of children worldwide through sustainable development initiatives, education, and community engagement.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: A world where every child has access to the resources, support, and opportunities they need to lead healthy, fulfilling lives.

contact.title: Get In Touch
contact.description: We'd love to hear from you! Reach out to learn more about our programs or how you can get involved.
